page.title: 14Bildeston School Children
page.content: Then we went out to play on the field. We have dancing in the afternoon in the hall. The girls wear a blue band so they can see who are the boys! My best dance is 'Four Around Four' but we all like 'I want to be near you'. Then we did our English before going out to play. Some children go to recorders but the better players go on Thursday lunch time. All the rest listen to a story. We have prayers and go home. I walk but some go on a mini-bus, a big bus or in a car. After tea I put on my nighty, cleaned my teeth and went to bed. Laura, Lynsey, Edward, Christopher, Tracy and Jacqueline. 6 and 7 years old.
